Class DatabaseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.DatabaseUtils
      • org.tomleese.platinum.utils.DatabaseUtils

  • public abstract class DatabaseUtils
extends android.database.DatabaseUtils
    Utilities for working with databases. Extends the android DatabaseUtils class for ease of use.

    • Method Detail

      • cursorToList

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> cursorToList(java.lang.Class<T> klass,
                                 android.database.Cursor cursor,
                                 boolean closeCursor,
                                 android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase database,
                                 boolean closeDatabase)
        Converts a cursor into a list of classes. The class type must have a constructor which takes a ContentValues instance.
        Parameters:
        klass - The class type to create an instance of
        cursor - The cursor to look through
        closeCursor - If true, closes the cursor
        database - The database, currently only used for closing
        closeDatabase - If true, closes the database
        Returns:
        A new list of items

      • cursorToList

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> cursorToList(java.lang.Class<T> klass,
                                 android.database.Cursor cursor,
                                 boolean closeCursor)
        Converts a cursor into a list of classes. The class type must have a constructor which takes a ContentValues instance. This does not close the database at the end.
        Parameters:
        klass - The class type to create an instance of
        cursor - The cursor to look through
        closeCursor - If true, closes the cursor
        Returns:
        A new list of items

      • cursorToList

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> cursorToList(java.lang.Class<T> klass,
                                 android.database.Cursor cursor)
        Converts a cursor into a list of classes. The class type must have a constructor which takes a ContentValues instance. This does not close the cursor or database at the end.
        Parameters:
        klass - The class type to create an instance of
        cursor - The cursor to look through
        Returns:
        A new list of items
